functions.tag:
{CustomModelData:548001,Damage:1,HideFlags:32,pages:['{"text":"If somebody ever reads this, we have been forced to evacuate our city.
An illness has spread amongst us like fire, blinding the minds of every infected person, making them hostile towards their caretakers. Some of them burst into flames when stepping under the sunlight,","color":"black"}','{"text":"but at night time we are not capable of holding them all back.
The amount of casualties keeps rising, and we are afraid every one of us will get affected if we stay for too long.
We all healthy citizens will search for the closest city, in hopes that this plague has only affected us.","color":"black"}','[{"text":"󏿘","color":"black","font":"siscu_se:negative_spaces"},{"text":"","color":"white","font":"siscu_se:book_pages"},{"text":"A barricade will be built when we get support from other towns, but for now it is inviable to hold any infected back.","color":"black","font":"minecraft:default"}]'], generation: 3, author: "Mayor Wilson Hare",title:"Mayor's Note"}
